name: 2nd International Conference on Big Data, IOT & NLP
content: 2nd International Conference on Big Data, IOT & NLP (BINLP 2022) October 29 \~ 30, 2022, Vienna, Austria https://csty2022.org/binlp/index SCOPE 2nd International Conference on Big Data, IOT & NLP (BINLP 2022) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Big Data, IoT and NLP. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the areas of Big Data, Internet of Things and NLP Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to. TOPICS OF INTEREST • Argumentation Mining and Applications • Deep Learning, Neural Languages and NLP • Social Media and Web Analytics • Question Answering (QA) • Corpus Analysis • Semantic Web, Open Linked Data, and Ontologies • Natural Language in Conceptual Modeling • Natural language and Ubiquitous Computing • NLP techniques for Internet of Things (IoT) • NLP techniques for ambient intelligence • Big Data & Business Intelligence • Information Extraction, Retrieval • Semantic Processing & NLP • Security and Privacy for IoT • IoT-enabled Innovation and Entrepreneurship • IoT Applications and Services • Experimental Results and Deployment Scenarios • Electronics and Signal processing for IoT • Connectivity and Networking Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by October 08, 2022\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from BINLP 2022, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • International Journal of Next - Generation Network ( IJNGN) • The International Journal of Ambient Systems and Applications (IJASA) • International Journal of Ubiquitous Computing (IJU) • International Journal on Natural Language Computing (IJNLC) • International Journal of Grid Computing & Applications (IJGCA) • Information Technology in Industry (ITII) IMPORTANT DATES Submission Deadline :October 08, 2022 Authors Notification :October 20, 2022 Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : October 22 2022 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : binlp@csty2022.org or binlpconf@yahoo.com
